Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-48384 affecting package git for versions less than 2.40.4-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-48384 affecting package git for versions less than 2.40.4-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package git is earlier than 2.40.4-2, affected by CVE-2025-48384
